title: Add pressure performance section
description: Add Pressure Performance section to stat packs showing high-RRR scenario batting. Identify clutch performers vs chokers when RRR > 10 or in last 5 overs. Calculate SR/avg under pressure and rank players by clutch factor. Delivered: 10 analytics views (weighted scoring, entry context, IPL experience filter), Section 11 in all 10 stat packs (4 subsections + glossary), 5 CSVs, team page Pressure tab with JS data, analysis page cards, glossary on all surfaces.

founder_validation.feedback: Pressure performance complete: 10 analytics views (weighted scoring, entry context, IPL filter), Section 11 in all 10 stat packs, 5 CSVs, team page Pressure tab, analysis cards, glossary on all surfaces.
